summary: The Singapore lender joins a group that supports Hedera’s Hashgraph distributed ledger technology.
title: DBS Becomes First Southeast Asian Bank to Join Hedera Governing Council
content: Singapore’s DBS Bank has joined the Hedera Governing Council, the first Southeast Asian lender to join a global group of companies that supports Hedera’s Hashgraph, a software that can process transactions and store a public ledger of those transactions.
Read more: Chainlink Labs Joins Hedera Hashgraph Governing Council

entity.type: Chainlink Labs Joins Hedera Hashgraph Governing Council
